pages.text: Mercenaries are people we rarely know anything about, operating from either the shadows or not operating at all, these people are unpredictable and extremely dangerous.

pages.title: Passive Abilities
pages.text: $(li) 30% Piercing damage: Any total damage done will add piercing damage worth of 0.3 x TotalDamage. Piercing damage ignores armor. $(li)
$(li) -50% Attack or projectile damage: Any total damage done - melee damage for melee users and projectile damage for range users - will lose 0.5 x Damage = NewDamage.
